page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content: {WEEKDAY {Breakfast:}According to a survey of 11 year olds was usually cereal (corn-flakes most often) or toast and butter with milk, tea or coffee being equally popular drinks. A cooked breakfast was rare. {Lunch:}A cooked meal, usually in the school dining hall, with sausage,baked beans & chips most popular. Dessert was a snack & drink of milk.Sandwich lunches rare. {Tea:}Generally a cooked meal followed by a snack supper before bed: {SUNDAYS:}Even in age of convenience foods still special family occasions. {Breakfast:}More likely to be cooked but majority cereal and/or toast. {Lunch:}Traditional meal- usually roast chicken, roast & boiled potatoes,peas carrots,gravy then apple crumble. {Tea &}Supper.Light.Usually sandwiches.
